description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken with Fruity Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Chicken with Fruity Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill chicken cavity with stuffing mixture. Tie legs together with kitchen string. Place chicken, breast-side up, in a roasting pan. Season with salt and pepper. Cook for 1 hour 15 minutes or until golden and cooked when tested with a skewer. Carve chicken and serve.
